name: specimen
description: The collection of data elements related to a donor's specimen. A specimen is any material sample taken for testing, diagnostic or research purposes.

fields.name: submitter_participant_id
fields.description: Unique identifier for the participant, assigned by the data provider.

meta.notes: Source: MOH/ARGO;CQDG: submitter_participant_id;mCODE STU3: Patient.Identifier;Phenopacket: Individual.id;Beacon V2: Individual.id

fields.name: submitter_specimen_id
fields.description: Unique identifier of the specimen, assigned by the data provider.

meta.notes: Source:MOH/ARGO;CQDG: submitter_biospecimen_id;mCODE STU3: Specimen.Identifier;Phenopacket: Biosample.id;Beacon V2: Biosample.id
Source: MOH;mCODE STU3: Specimen.Type;Phenopacket: Biosample.sampled_tissue;Beacon V2: Biosample.sampled_tissue

fields.name: specimen_collection_date
fields.description: Indicate the date when the specimen was collected from donor.

meta.notes: Source: MOH;mCODE STU2: Specimen.collection.collected[x].dateTime;Phenopacket: Biosample.time_of_collection;Beacon V2: Biosample.time_of_collection

fields.name: specimen_anatomic_location
fields.description: Indicate the ICD-O-3 topography code for the anatomic location of a specimen when it was collected. Refer to the guidelines provided in the ICD-O-3 manual at https://apps.who.int/iris/handle/10665/42344
